summary: Two teenage summer camp counselors struggle with their younger campers, providing a variety of humorous situations and romantic encounters.
cast: Michael J. Fox|Nancy McKeon|Caren Kaye|Adam Baldwin|Robert Klein|Joe Wright|Thomas Nowell|Matthew Shugailo|Derek Googe|Cary Guffey|Cameron Arnett|Brett Rice|David Wasman|Shanna Stewart|Carol Chambers|Frankie Miraglia|Lisa Adler|Joan Riordan|Marc Clement|Lou Walker|Jarrett Ellis Beal|Gibran Brown|Thad Persons|Josh Jarboe|Ginger Taylor|Roberta Illg|Wesley Gelb|Ryan Mullinax|Jan Maris|Shaun Cornish|Chris Greer|Harvey Christiansen|Hoke Reece|Tim Card|Andrew Inselmann|Lavon Lacey|Dan Levinson|D. Taylor Loeb|James McEachin|Michael Joseph Pierce
title: Movida en el campamento
